The latest results in Congo’s disputed electionDemocratic Republic of Congo is gradually releasing preliminary results from the Dec. 20 presidential election following a chaotic vote and an unscheduled ballot extension that have led the opposition to demand a re-run. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:46:22 GMT PRAIKS2URRNHRPAHHUMNMP4QUM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/latest-results-congo-disputed-election-2023-12-29/Reuters世界非洲
Russia launches massive air attack on Ukraine, at least 10 dead - KyivRussia unleashed its largest drone and missile attack on Ukraine in months on Friday, killing 10 people and wounding at least 60 others in Kyiv, the south, west and east of the country, officials said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:25:53 GMT YM2IAXF3IBIRDE2HOT4Y5HYHOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-massive-air-attack-ukraine-least-10-dead-kiev-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
One killed, 15 injured in Russian missile attacks on Kyiv, Kharkiv -officialsOne person was killed and eight injured in Kharkiv, and seven more injured in Kyiv during massive Russian missile attacks on Friday, officials said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:02:47 GMT 4CPGDTX7OBMQTAMVGLFQWJYBVU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/one-killed-15-injured-Russian-missile-attacks-kyiv-kharkiv-officials-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Two killed, 15 injured in Russian strike on Odesa - governorTwo people were killed and at least 15 were injured, including two children, as Russian missiles hit residential buildings in the southern city of Odesa, the regional governor said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:00:44 GMT E6J4SPWVZFOLVBJ46LKM3EAD2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/two-killed-15-injured-Russian-strike-odesa-governor-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
China's fireworks ban sparks fiery debate ahead of Lunar New YearChinese lawmakers on Friday weighed in on a fiery online debate on whether fireworks should be used to ring in the Lunar New Year in February, saying a total ban on pyrotechnics in the country credited with inventing them would be hard to implement. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 07:28:05 GMT 2MZP74RMNZJJ7BAXHKEIXPKLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-fireworks-ban-sparks-fiery-debate-ahead-lunar-new-year-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中国
Iran executes four accused of sabotage, links to Israel's MossadIran executed on Friday four people, including a woman, whom it accused of being "saboteurs" with links to Israel's Mossad intelligence service, the Mizan news agency said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 05:14:52 GMT KNAEW7IBFVNNLBMNX6VERB53GY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-says-it-executes-four-saboteurs-linked-to-israeli-mossad-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中东地区
Nicaragua arrests two high-ranking Catholic priests with close ties to cardinalNicaraguan police detained on Thursday two senior Catholic priests who are close to the country's top church leader, a person with knowledge of the matter said, raising to at least six the number of clergymen detained this week. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 05:12:05 GMT LEAES5H6H5LDJAINPDP7QZP4GY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/nicaragua-arrests-two-high-ranking-catholic-priests-with-close-ties-cardinal-2023-12-29/Ismael Lopez世界美洲
Indonesia navy drives away boat carrying Rohingya - militaryAn Indonesian navy vessel in Aceh drove away a boat carrying Rohingya from Myanmar, as growing numbers of would-be refugees from the strife-torn country face hostility from locals. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 04:57:35 GMT HZH5RCM5FRJMTPBIFT2K5FAKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-navy-drives-away-boat-carrying-rohingya-military-2023-12-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine's Kharkiv under missile attack, drones over LvivThe Ukrainian city of Kharkiv came under a Russian missile attack on Friday morning, Mayor Ihor Terehov said, with at least six blasts registered. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 03:26:50 GMT AZEOBT6LCNJWPLWIIAS6TDTQSY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kharkiv-ukraine-under-missile-attack-drones-over-lviv-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
India's far-right cow vigilantes bolster clout before high-stake electionsVishnu Dabad attributes his rise from poverty to powerful local politician to an animal: the cow. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 02:05:18 GMT FZ6LVLLZDFKFHAG4HAA25U27MU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-far-right-cow-vigilantes-bolster-clout-ahead-high-stake-elections-2023-12-29/Rupam Jain世界印度
Australia braces for heatwave, thunderstorms on New Year's holiday weekendAustralia is bracing for an intense heatwave across its north and west during the New Year's holiday weekend with temperatures forecast to touch more than 45 degrees Celsius (113°F), while severe thunderstorms were expected to hit the country's east. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 01:41:32 GMT XYZ4AYT4EZPZ3J7DUXAF4J77YI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-braces-heatwave-thunderstorms-new-years-holiday-weekend-2023-12-29/Renju Jose世界亚太地区
